DOC.brief_summary: This is a 24-week study investigating the safety and efficacy of several dosages of a potential new oral medicine for Type II diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: A New Oral Treatment For Type II Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: A 12-Week, Parallel-Group, Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter, Dose Ranging Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of GW823093, Administered Orally, Once Daily, as Monotherapy in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus followed by a 12-week Active Treatment Extension
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Women must not be pregnant and must not be breastfeeding. Have Type II diabetes. Not taking any medicine for diabetes, or taking one oral medicine for their diabetes. Exclusion criteria: Have any underlying or significant active disease that would prevent the subject from safely participating in the trial by the judgement of the study doctor.
